description: An ancient city of Siceliote origin on the north coast of Sicily.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: near Capo d’Orlando (contra Manni 1981, 138-39)

names.details: The place is listed as "Capo d'Orlando" in the BTCGI. An association with Capo d'Orlando is also indicated in the Barrington Atlas. A different association is suggested by Manni 1981 (Cf. "Sant'Agata di Militello")
